item.title: Meet People Inc: Dotdash Meredith Media Empire Unveils Rebrand
item.description: “In this age of everything being synthetic and artificial and amalgamated and mashed up, we are people making content for people,” CEO Neil Vogel says of the company, which owns People, Food & Win
